actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Government Operations.

official_title: A bill to transfer responsibility for furnishing certified copies of certain payment bonds from the comptroller General of the United States to the officer that awarded the contract for which the bond was given.

summary.text: Transfers responsibility for furnishing certified copies of payment bonds from the Comptroller General to the officer that awarded the public contract for which the bond was given.

titles.title: A bill to transfer responsibility for furnishing certified copies of certain payment bonds from the comptroller General of the United States to the officer that awarded the contract for which the bond was given.
